## Functions & packages
### Function: 
A block of code that performs a particular task or set of tasks. A function has a name, **arguments**, a body (code), and a return value.
<br>

### Arguments:
Change-able inputs to a function.
<br>

### Package:
A portable collection of R functions.
<br>
